abstract: Guessing who’s behind The Secret Diary of Steve Jobs, a satirical blog by an anonymous writer calling himself the Fake Steve Jobs, has become a parlor game in Silicon Valley, with several journalists, former Apple employees and even Steve Jobs himself topping the list of suspects.
lead_paragraph: Guessing who’s behind The Secret Diary of Steve Jobs, a satirical blog by an anonymous writer calling himself the Fake Steve Jobs, has become a parlor game in Silicon Valley, with several journalists, former Apple employees and even Steve Jobs himself topping the list of suspects.

headline.main: A Deal (and Perhaps an Unveiling) for a Fake Steve Jobs
